title: cryptopher1
author: cryptopher1
created_time: September 30, 2022, 01:00:08 PMLast edit: October 06, 2022, 10:46:34 AM by cryptopher1
content: Hello everyone,I want to introduce you to my new service. Contact me to help with development of marketing plans (including offline and online campaign) for your crypto projects. I have experience as a marketer with real crypto projects especially exchanges. In my plan I will research and give you a marketing plan aimed at driving your brand awareness and increase conversion rates. The marketing plans can be broken down into 1 to 3 months plan/activities. Thereafter, we evaluate the effectiveness of plans put in place, learn on things to improve and chart a course for the next quarter. Contact me Telegram @BTCJazz01

comments.author: cryptopher1
comments.body: 1 month marketing plan rate is $500 while the 3 month option is $1350. For more information contact on Telegram @BTCJazz01

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: cryptopher1 on October 04, 2022, 01:52:23 PM1 month marketing plan rate is $500 while the 3 month option is $1350. For more information contact on Telegram @BTCJazz01The only thing that i can suggest you is you can compete with another marketing management through make your own thread. It's important to create one in the service section and break down all of your track record in your thread. this to make sure that if the developers of altcoins or something else will try to be interested with your offer and starting to hire you as their marketer. This may good for you. Have you made one before? Introduce your service in the right section which has so much traffic

I felt having a thread here would be nice to try and reach guys announcing their projects under the Altcoin section.
